cast.name: 毛里齐奥·隆巴迪 Maurizio Lombardi
奥罗拉·乔维纳佐 Aurora Giovinazzo
保罗·皮耶罗邦 Paolo Pierobon

director.name: 洛伦佐·维尼奥洛 Lorenzo Vignolo

trans_title: 涨跌互现 第一季 第一季
introduction: Alfa and Omega are two elevator operators and are tasked with guiding guests to their destiny. Their condition is to live in a kind of limbo, a strange world with very strict rules and from which they absolutely want to get out. Alfa is more experienced and true to duty, Omega is on his first day on the job, he is restless and creates problems. He will discover on his first journey that he has a supernatural gift, touching the guests with his own hand.
chinese_title: 涨跌互现 第一季 第一季
